rukus.text: My ne utvoryly nebesa ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy, marno. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu myslennya tsykh khto disbelieve. Tomu, prykroshchi do tsykh khto disbelieve; vony postrazhdayutʹ u Pekli

my Budemo obrobyty tsi khto vvazhayutʹ ta Bude pryvesty spravedlyve zhyttya tomu shcho my obroblyayemo tsi khto zdiysnyuyutʹ zlo na zemli? My budemo obrobyty spravedlyvyy tomu shcho my stavymosʹ bezputnyy
Tse ye svyate pysannya shcho my poslaly vnyz do vas, shcho vmiye svyashchenni mozhlyvo vony viddzerkalyuyutʹ na yoho virshakh. Tsey khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu vizʹme uvahu
David my harantuvaly Solomon; harnyy ta slukhnyanyy sluzhbovetsʹ
odyn denʹ vin stav preoccupied z krasyvymy kinʹmy, do nochi vpav
Vin todi skazav, "ya otrymav nasolodu vid materialʹnykh rechey bilʹsh nizh ya otrymav nasolodu vid obozhnyuyuchoho moho Lorda, do sontsya znyk
Prynosyatʹ yim nazad." (Shchob braty uchastʹ u torhakh proshchannya,) vin styrav yikhni nohy ta shyyi
My takym chynom stavymo Solomon do testu; my blahoslovlyaly yoho z prostorym materialʹnym bahat·stvom, ale vin steadfastly pidkoryvsya
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, probachayutʹ meni, ta harantuyutʹ meni tsaryuvannya nikoly ne dosyahnute budʹ khto shche. Vy yavlyayete soboyu Nadavacha subsydiyi
My (vidpovidaly yoho molytvu ta) zdiysnyuvav viter u yoho rozporyadzhenni, llyuchomu doshchi de zavhodno vin zakhotiv
Inshi buly rozmishcheni u yoho rozporyadzhenni
Tse ye nashe zabezpechennya do vas; vy mozhete daty velykodushno, abo mozhete utrymaty, bez mezh
Vin zasluzhyv pochesnu pozytsiyu z namy, ta dyvovyzhnu abode
